lead_paragraph: I'll shortly be on my way to the ASSA meetings in Chicago. What with travel and all, quite possibly no posting for some time. At the meetings all my stuff will be on Saturday: a joint presentation of my work with Gauti Eggertsson at 8 AM, a meet-and-greet at the Worth booth from 3:30-5, and a presentation of my 33-year-old paper on interstellar trade (kept fresh by time dilation) at Yoram Bauman's humor in economics session at 8 PM. What will I do with all my free time?
